basic.description: Introduction to the chemical basis of biological systems and biomolecules, protein structure and synthesis, enzyme catalysis, nucleic acids (DNA, RNA), carbohydrates, membranes, cell signalling, biosynthetic and metabolic pathways.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Biological Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENCH 311 OR CHEM 311 and registered in BSCE
